body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```
On Windows OneCore VM, use PowerShell Direct to connect and attempt to run:

Stop-Service xxx

```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```
Service stops
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```
cmdlet fails and service doesn't stop
```

----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable

```
